mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PHOTO_COMTS WHERE PCOMT_PHOTO_SEQ = #{photoSeq}

SELECT PCOMT_SEQ as "seq", PCOMT_PHOTO_SEQ as "photoSeq", PCOMT_NAME as "name", PCOMT_PWD as "password", PCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", PCOMT_DATE as "date", PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PHOTO_COMTS WHERE PCOMT_PHOTO_SEQ = #{photoSeq} ORDER BY CONCAT(IF(PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ is null, COALESCE(PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ, ''), CONCAT('_', LPAD(PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ,6,'0')) ), '_',LPAD(PCOMT_SEQ,6,'0'))

SELECT PCOMT_SEQ as "seq", PCOMT_PHOTO_SEQ as "photoSeq", PCOMT_NAME as "name", PCOMT_PWD as "password", PCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", PCOMT_DATE as "DATE", PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PHOTO_COMTS WHERE PCOMT_SEQ = #{seq}
